A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I didnt' like the fact that the questions raised in the Force Awakens were ignored.  This presented a lot of issues going into the next film.  I really didn't like how the character of Luke Skywalker was portrayed in this movie\, it just didn't fit.  Would have also liked to see more interaction between the trio of Finn\, Rey\, and Poe\, or at least Finn and Poe as their relationship was very interesting in the previous film\, but almost non-existent in this one.
